name: Space Miner TD
description:
A cosmic-themed tower defense with game cheats.

Objective: Unlock the Research Center and farm ֏ in order to clear all 3 levels on the hardest difficulty.

Average level time: 3-10 minutes

Made for Major Jam 4: Cosmic

1920x1080 Recommended

Easter eggs:

Turning on all game cheats will attract space pirate bosses. And to use "Control Asteroid" cheat to it's fullest potential, click-drag one of the drifting asteroids on each level onto a turret platform to create an Asteroid Turret.
